breakfast.name: Pancakes
breakfast.description: Fluffy pancakes served with a generous drizzle of rich maple syrup, topped with fresh strawberries and a dollop of whipped cream for the perfect sweet start to your day.

breakfast.name: Omelette
breakfast.description: A fluffy three-egg omelette packed with your choice of fillings, including sautéed mushrooms, fresh spinach, diced tomatoes, and melted cheese, served with a side of crispy hash browns.

breakfast.name: French Toast
breakfast.description: Thick slices of bread soaked in a creamy custard, griddled to golden perfection, and served with a sprinkle of powdered sugar and fresh berries for a delightful morning treat.

breakfast.name: Avocado Toast
breakfast.description: Smashed avocado seasoned with a hint of lime and topped with sliced radishes and microgreens, served on toasted whole grain bread for a healthy, satisfying breakfast.

breakfast.name: Breakfast Burrito
breakfast.description: A warm tortilla filled with scrambled eggs, melted cheese, and a medley of fresh vegetables, wrapped tightly and served with salsa for a delicious on-the-go meal.

lunch.name: Caesar Salad
lunch.description: Crisp romaine lettuce tossed in our house-made Caesar dressing, topped with crunchy croutons and shaved Parmesan cheese, offering a classic taste that never goes out of style.

lunch.name: Grilled Chicken Sandwich
lunch.description: Juicy grilled chicken breast topped with fresh lettuce, ripe tomato, and a creamy garlic aioli, served on a toasted bun for a mouthwatering lunch experience.

lunch.name: Cheeseburger
lunch.description: A hearty beef patty grilled to perfection, topped with melted cheddar cheese, crisp lettuce, tomato, and our signature sauce, served on a toasted sesame seed bun with fries.

lunch.name: Vegetarian Wrap
lunch.description: Grilled seasonal vegetables and creamy hummus wrapped in a soft whole-wheat tortilla, served with a side of tangy yogurt sauce for a refreshing, healthy option.

lunch.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
lunch.description: Classic Italian pasta served with a rich and hearty meat sauce, made from ground beef simmered with tomatoes, herbs, and spices, garnished with fresh basil and Parmesan.

snacks.name: Nachos
snacks.description: Crispy tortilla chips generously topped with melted cheese, jalapeños, and a dollop of sour cream, served with fresh salsa on the side for dipping.

snacks.name: Spring Rolls
snacks.description: Crispy and light spring rolls filled with a colorful mix of fresh vegetables and served with a sweet chili dipping sauce for a delightful crunch.

snacks.name: Garlic Bread
snacks.description: Toasted bread slices generously spread with garlic butter and herbs, baked until golden and served warm for a perfect side to any meal.

snacks.name: Chicken Wings
snacks.description: Spicy buffalo chicken wings tossed in our signature sauce, served with celery sticks and a side of creamy ranch dip for the ultimate snack experience.

snacks.name: Mozzarella Sticks
snacks.description: Crispy fried mozzarella cheese served with a side of marinara sauce for dipping, offering a gooey and delicious snack that's perfect for sharing.

drinks.name: Coffee
drinks.description: Freshly brewed coffee made from premium beans, served hot and strong, perfect for starting your day or enjoying a midday pick-me-up.

drinks.name: Smoothie
drinks.description: A delicious blend of fresh fruits and yogurt, this smoothie is both refreshing and nutritious, available in a variety of flavors to satisfy your cravings.

drinks.name: Iced Tea
drinks.description: Chilled tea infused with lemon, offering a refreshing and revitalizing drink that is perfect for warm days.

drinks.name: Hot Chocolate
drinks.description: Rich hot chocolate made with real cocoa and topped with fluffy whipped cream, providing a cozy treat to warm you up on cold days.

drinks.name: Orange Juice
drinks.description: Freshly squeezed orange juice, bursting with flavor and nutrients, making it the perfect complement to your breakfast or brunch.

drinks.name: Lemonade
drinks.description: Sweet and tangy freshly squeezed lemonade, served over ice for a refreshing drink that quenches your thirst on hot summer days.

drinks.name: Apple Juice
drinks.description: Crisp and refreshing apple juice, made from the finest apples, providing a naturally sweet taste that's loved by all ages.

drinks.name: Coconut Water
drinks.description: Refreshing coconut water straight from young coconuts, providing a natural source of hydration with a hint of sweetness.

drinks.name: Sparkling Water
drinks.description: Refreshing sparkling water, lightly carbonated to give you a bubbly drink that is perfect for any occasion.

drinks.name: Mint Lemonade
drinks.description: A refreshing twist on classic lemonade, infused with fresh mint leaves for a cool and invigorating drink experience.

drinks.name: Berry Smoothie
drinks.description: A delicious blend of mixed berries and yogurt, this smoothie is not only tasty but also packed with antioxidants and vitamins.

drinks.name: Mango Lassi
drinks.description: A traditional Indian yogurt drink made with ripe mangoes and a hint of cardamom, providing a creamy and refreshing beverage.

drinks.name: Peach Iced Tea
drinks.description: Refreshing iced tea infused with sweet peach flavor, served chilled for a delightful summer drink.

drinks.name: Chai Latte
drinks.description: A spiced tea made with a blend of aromatic spices and milk, offering a warm and comforting drink experience.

drinks.name: Tropical Smoothie
drinks.description: A tropical blend of pineapple, banana, and coconut, this smoothie is like a vacation in a glass, perfect for refreshing your day.

drinks.name: Fruit Punch
drinks.description: A sweet and fruity beverage made with a blend of various fruit juices, providing a colorful and refreshing drink option.

alcoholic_drinks.name: Margarita
alcoholic_drinks.description: A classic cocktail made with tequila, lime juice, and triple sec, served in a salted rim glass for a zesty and refreshing drink.

alcoholic_drinks.name: Mojito
alcoholic_drinks.description: A refreshing blend of white rum, fresh lime juice, mint leaves, and soda water, offering a crisp and invigorating cocktail experience.

alcoholic_drinks.name: Whiskey Sour
alcoholic_drinks.description: A balanced cocktail made with whiskey, lemon juice, and sugar, shaken to perfection and garnished with a cherry for a classic drink.

alcoholic_drinks.name: Pina Colada
alcoholic_drinks.description: A tropical cocktail made with rum, coconut cream, and pineapple juice, blended until smooth and served with a slice of pineapple for a beachy vibe.

alcoholic_drinks.name: Red Wine
alcoholic_drinks.description: A selection of fine red wines from various regions, offering rich and robust flavors perfect for pairing with meals.

alcoholic_drinks.name: White Wine
alcoholic_drinks.description: A selection of crisp white wines, ideal for refreshing your palate and pairing with lighter dishes.

alcoholic_drinks.name: Craft Beer
alcoholic_drinks.description: A rotating selection of local craft beers, each with its unique flavor profile, from hoppy IPAs to rich stouts.

desserts.name: Chocolate Cake
desserts.description: Decadent layers of rich chocolate cake filled with creamy chocolate ganache, topped with chocolate frosting and chocolate shavings.

desserts.name: Cheesecake
desserts.description: Creamy cheesecake on a buttery graham cracker crust, drizzled with your choice of strawberry or caramel sauce for added sweetness.

desserts.name: Apple Pie
desserts.description: Classic apple pie filled with tender apples and warm spices, baked to golden perfection and served with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.

desserts.name: Tiramisu
desserts.description: A delightful Italian dessert made with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and creamy mascarpone cheese, dusted with cocoa powder.

desserts.name: Ice Cream Sundae
desserts.description: A delightful scoop of vanilla ice cream topped with your choice of chocolate, caramel, or fruit sauce, finished with whipped cream and a cherry on top.

desserts.name: Brownie Sundae
desserts.description: Rich chocolate brownie topped with a scoop of vanilla ice cream, drizzled with chocolate sauce, and garnished with nuts and whipped cream.
